title: Requirements V2 Addendum - Architectural Corrections (Supersedes Original)
response:
Feedback Summary (6 comments):

Specific Text Comments:
1. "- Creates isolated git worktrees for each worker a...": agent-producer shouldn't be creating git worktree, only agent-artist, agent-designer, and agent-programmer should create git worktree.
2. "- ❌ agent-producer does NOT publish custom KĀDI ev...": Noted that agent-producer should be able to event pub/sub through kadi-broker, so that agent-artist, agent-designer, agent-programmer can receive event and then execute the tasks
3. ""args": ["C:/p4/Personal/SD/shrimp-agent-playgroun...": This should be "C:\GitHub\mcp-shrimp-task-manager", please go read C:\p4\Personal\SD\kadi\kadi-broker\config\mcp-upstreams.json to better understand what you should do.
4. "**After Successful Completion:**": After successful completion means the user should verify the tasks is complete, and then agent-producer should push to remote github repo, and then agent-designer, agent-artist, agent-programmer should then remove the git worktree
5. "### 2.3 BaseBot Inheritance Pattern": I don't think agent-producer should extend the BaseBot again because it already has discord-bot.ts and slack-bot.ts inside agent-producer project. Pleaes go read "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-producer" again.
6. "development": This should be programmer

After successful completion means the user should verify the tasks is complete, and then agent-producer should push to remote github repo, and then agent-designer, agent-artist, agent-programmer should then remove the git worktree

I don't think agent-producer should extend the BaseBot again because it already has discord-bot.ts and slack-bot.ts inside agent-producer project. Pleaes go read "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-producer" again.
